  name: "mapping7",
  roles: ["ldap-example-user"],
  enabled: true,
  rules: {
    all: [
      {
        field: {
          dn: "*,ou=subtree,dc=example,dc=com",
        },
      },

        field: {
          "realm.name": "ldap1",
        },
      },
    ],
  },
});
